ygData.subject: Re: Pottery Skill, to Rokenn Swiftsong (was re: Forage  Skill)
ygData.msgSnippet: what can someone with a master pottery skill make?  i had a friend who was messing around with it make a medium clay jar, which i use to keep my food in under
ygData.messageBody:
what can someone with a master pottery skill make? i had a friend who was
messing around with it make a medium clay jar, which i use to keep my food
in under the rumor that it degenerates slower. can larger jars be made? my
medium jar only has four spots.

and heck i need something to do. how do you get your pottery skill up,
where at, and how much does it cost?

thanks for any info.



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 7:13 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Forage Skill
>
>
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
>
> <snip>
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> Master Brewer, Baker, and Pottery maker of Societus Argenti
> Amerginn - Test server
>
